title: Bronze 1 and cant get lp, get horrible teams
body: Hello fellow summoners, i recently completed my placement games and got put into bronze 1, now i am aiming to push to silver 5 or high possibly gold by the end of this year. I have played at least 10 games after my placement games and have not won a single one. This is either due to having a toxic team that argues and then AFK or does there own thing like farm bot lane while in a team fight, OR having no game sense what so ever and now its getting frustrating. 10 games 0 wins 0 LP. Any suggestions or advice to get to silver and actually win games? Thank you for reading this, if any one wants to help me by being a duo that would be great :) just add me WilliK

replies.body:
i remember when i started playing one year ago
it taken me bout 2 months to get out of bronze and havent been there since
climbed to gold 5 0lp in s6 and currently p4 

the secret is to hard carrying. that is how u deserve to get out of bronze

Start with focusing on improving your cs.
Also think that everything is your own fault and what could you do better
Thanks for the advice just wondering is gold a reasonable goal to get to by the end of this year or will it take longer than a year to get to it
Depends how much you improve. Only if you improve enough to get to gold will determine the length of time you take to get to gold.
i just got demoted to bronze 2 now as too many losses is it possible to skip a few ranks so for example if i win like all of my promos could i go up to silver 5 from bronze 2
It's unreasonable if you're going to keep blaming everyone else but yourself.
You can skip if your mmr is high enough. However i donk think skipping from bronze 2 to silver is a possibility. Only brinze 5 to 3 or 4 to 2 etc.
